trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_SEQ_00<tab>Eilis would call you to the wall once more.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_SEQ_01<tab>Eilis has briefed you on the need to divert Sahagin forces away from South Tidegate. Speak with Nortmoen about the tactical situation.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_SEQ_02<tab>Nortmoen outlines a simple plan: slay a pair of trenchtooth Sahagin.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_SEQ_03<tab>Apprise Eilis of the situation in the north.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_SEQ_04<tab>Eilis reports that the decoy attack was a success, and that the detachment returned safely through the southern gates without ado.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_EILIS_000_001<tab>We would open South Tidegate to welcome a returning detachment, but doing so would expose us to the Sahagin.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_EILIS_000_002<tab>Thus, we aim to launch a diversionary attack along the north side and lure the Sahagin hordes away from the open gate.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_EILIS_000_003<tab>Seek out Nortmoen at North Tidegate─the offensive falls under his command.

TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_NORTMOEN_000_010<tab>So you've come to help bail my beleaguered brother out from under trouble's foot once more? Very well. All you need do is slay a pair of the skittish little sea slugs─that ought to summon the lot of them.
TEXT_GAIUSC808_01032_EILIS_000_020<tab>Sure as rain, our subtle stratagem drew the southerly sea-sods away from the open gates. The men of the detachment send their gratitude.
